document.full_text: while hollywood scrambles to figure out ways to exploit the death of osama bin laden on screen, the first movie that could actually benefit from the news is likely to be the final harry potter movie, "harry potter and the deathly hallows: part 2," which comes out on july 15.
document.title: eerie links between harry potter, bin laden
lines_and_colors: while hollywood scrambles to figure out ways to exploit the death of osama bin laden on screen, the first movie that could actually benefit from the news is likely to be the final harry potter movie, "harry potter and the deathly hallows: part 2," which comes out on july 15.
